question: Have you achieved 1st to 8th place in the Olympic, World, or European Games in the age categories of men-women, young men-young women, juniors, or children in a sport recognized by the General Secretariat of Sports?

Have you achieved 1st to 3rd place in the Mediterranean Games in the age categories of men-women, young men-young women, juniors, or children in a sport recognized by the General Secretariat of Sports?
Have you achieved 1st to 3rd place in World School Games in the high school category in a sport recognized by the General Secretariat of Sports?
Have you achieved or equaled a World or European record in the men-women age category in a sport recognized by the General Secretariat of Sports?
Have you achieved 1st to 3rd place in National School Championships in the high school category in a sport recognized by the General Secretariat of Sports?
Was the competition conducted according to the technical specifications of the Olympic Games?
Was the competition conducted according to the technical specifications of the relevant International Federation?
Was the sport a team event?
Did you participate in more than half of the games in the competition in which you were distinguished?
Have you been sanctioned for a doping violation?
